title: Why am i being paired with players higher than my elo?
body:
Im Silver 1, but im constantly being paired with players gold 5 or higher. Like, shouldnt I be paired with at least some silvers? That would  be more fair toward me. I want to win more games but im being placed with higher elo players, this is unfair. 
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
This account is only level 4 currently and doesn't have a rank, so I'm not sure what could be going on there. It might be because you're playing normals and not ranked maybe? Maybe your MMR is actually high enough to be matched with Gold Players in ranked after all.

Hit me up with the account you're referencing and I'm more than happy to look over your recent matches.

Oh this is the NA forums xD, sorry bout that. The account im talking about is on EUW and its the same name : sparpo. (also i just hit gold 5, so its not silver 1 anymore. But still, when i was silver 1,  almost all of my opponents and allies were of higher elo)

Here's more proof of unfair Matchmaking:

The below match is a Treeline Promo match for Silver 4 placement. 

As you can see, Despite my being Gold 5 and grouped with a Gold 5 and a Silver 2, I am facing three Plat 5 players.

https://imgur.com/a/f5mzM
